concept.title: PEW Distribution A/B Setup — LUFP7 (A064)

othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Procedure for setting up PEW distribution A/B using LUFP7 module A064 including wiring and validation steps.

othermeta.name: entities
othermeta.content: PEW Distribution A;LUFP7 A064;terminal blocks;power rails;fuses;mounting hardware

othermeta.name: usecase
othermeta.content: Guide technicians through PEW distribution A/B setup using LUFP7 module.

conbody.p:
The RX and TX Modbus signals have the Profibus addresses:
RX = 217
TX = 218
conbody.note: Bits that are not mentioned are reserved.
